entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 80 km/h gusting to 110. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:46 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 90 km/h gusting to 120 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 06:46 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:46 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
